description.value:
You inflict a curse upon the target that causes any wound to gush blood. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success For 1 minute, the first time each round that the target takes at least 10 @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2))d6[piercing]]{piercing} or @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2))d6[slashing]]{slashing} damage from a single Strike, it takes 2d6 additional damage of the same type.

Failure As success, but when it takes the additional damage, it also takes @Damage[(floor(@item.rank/2))d6[bleed]].

Heightened (+2) The additional damage increases by 1d6 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1d6.
